summary: Completed frontend testing of OC (Purchase Order) module UI/UX improvements. All 8 features verified working correctly. Fixed 2 bugs during testing: 1) Article badge not showing due to parseInt() on UUID strings, 2) CSS styling not applied due to unclosed media query in App.css.
passed_tests: TEST 1: Currency monospace font in OC list - 'S/ 590.00' uses JetBrains Mono
TEST 2: Fullscreen modal opens correctly (position: fixed, z-index: 9999)
TEST 3: Guardar button positioned on right side of header (x=1656)
TEST 4: Article search input is visible with placeholder 'Buscar artículo...'
TEST 5: Article dropdown selector works with 13 options
TEST 6: Provider selector has '+ Crear nuevo proveedor' option
TEST 7: Mini modal opens for provider creation with title 'Crear Nuevo Proveedor'
TEST 8: Article selected badge shows with green styling (gradient background, green text, border)

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: Article badge not showing after selection
bugs_fixed_during_testing.root_cause: Code used parseInt() on UUID strings which returns partial numbers instead of matching the full UUID
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Changed 'a.id === parseInt(linea.articulo_id)' to 'String(a.id) === String(linea.articulo_id)' in two places (line 207 and 732)

bugs_fixed_during_testing.issue: CSS styles for .articulo-selected-badge and other classes not being applied
bugs_fixed_during_testing.root_cause: Unclosed media query at line 1597 (.main-content missing closing brace) caused all subsequent CSS rules to be invalid
bugs_fixed_during_testing.fix: Added missing closing braces and fixed orphaned CSS code structure
